game.name: Dungeon Bomber
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 카메라 움직임 조정, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 터치 전용 옵션, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Dungeon Bomber is a chain-reaction roguelite where you place bombs and blow through the dungeon. Drop a bomb each turn, earn coins, and upgrade your deck. Fuse bombs to boost range and effects. Defeat advancing monsters and destroy the required blocks before your HP runs out.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dungeon Bomber is a chain-reaction roguelite where you place bombs and blow through the dungeon. Drop a bomb each turn, earn coins, and upgrade your deck. Fuse bombs to boost range and effects. Defeat advancing monsters and destroy the required blocks before your HP runs out.
